H0.text: Which four letter word beginning with L is a light toboggan for one or two people, ridden in a sitting or supine position. Lark

H1.text: Which four letter word beginning with L is a light toboggan for one or two people, ridden in a sitting or supine position. Lamp

H2.text: Which four letter word beginning with L is a light toboggan for one or two people, ridden in a sitting or supine position. Lash

H3.text: Which four letter word beginning with L is a light toboggan for one or two people, ridden in a sitting or supine position. Luge

A4.text: A luge () is a small one- or two-person sled on which one sleds supine (face-up) and feet-first.

A5.text: Luge is also the name of an Olympic sport that employs that sled and technique.
